body_html:
That indicates that the build is trying to build with Infiniband support, for some reason. You should be able to turn off the distributed build by setting NO_DISTRIBUTED=1 in your env.

If you want to help us debug, can you tell us if running ibv_devinfo outputs anything? And also check that you don't have WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS in your environment.
body_text:
That indicates that the build is trying to build with Infiniband support, for some reason. You should be able to turn off the distributed build by setting NO_DISTRIBUTED=1 in your env.
If you want to help us debug, can you tell us if running ibv_devinfo outputs anything? And also check that you don't have WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS in your environment.
body:
That indicates that the build is trying to build with Infiniband support, for some reason. You should be able to turn off the distributed build by setting `NO_DISTRIBUTED=1` in your env.

If you want to help us debug, can you tell us if running `ibv_devinfo` outputs anything? And also check that you don't have `WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS` in your environment.
